name: Boozy Brainiacs
description: A boozy quiz: every wrong answer sinks you closer to the bottom of your glass. Let's test your knowledge!

dares.title: No‑Calculator Math
dares.action: ${c_player}, what's 17 × 8?

dares.title: Capital Quiz
dares.action: ${c_player}, name the capital of Canada.

dares.title: Flag Guess
dares.action: ${c_player}, which country's flag has a maple leaf?

dares.title: Space First
dares.action: ${c_player}, who was the first human in space?

dares.title: Chemical Symbol
dares.action: ${c_player}, what's the chemical symbol for gold?

dares.title: Who Wrote It?
dares.action: ${c_player}, who wrote the novel '1984'?

dares.title: Speedy Translation
dares.action: ${c_player}, translate the word 'свобода' into English.

dares.title: Beatles Birthplace
dares.action: ${c_player}, in which city were The Beatles born?

dares.title: Exact Year
dares.action: ${c_player}, in what year did the USSR dissolve?

dares.title: Sports Timer
dares.action: ${c_player}, how many minutes is one half in football (soccer)?

dares.title: Math Blitz
dares.action: ${c_player}, what's the square root of 144?

dares.title: Greek War God
dares.action: ${c_player}, who was the god of war in Greek mythology?

dares.title: Planet Trio
dares.action: ${c_player}, name any three planets in the Solar System back‑to‑back.

dares.title: Literary Sidekick
dares.action: ${c_player}, what's the surname of the doctor in the Sherlock series?

dares.title: French Leader 1804
dares.action: ${c_player}, who led France in 1804?

dares.title: River City
dares.action: ${c_player}, which city does the Neva River flow through?

dares.title: Richter Measures?
dares.action: ${c_player}, what does the Richter scale measure?

dares.title: HTML Decode
dares.action: ${c_player}, what does the acronym HTML stand for?

dares.title: Paella Origin
dares.action: ${c_player}, which country is the dish 'paella' from?

dares.title: Tricky Capital
dares.action: ${c_player}, what's the capital of New Zealand?

dares.title: Water Formula
dares.action: ${c_player}, write the chemical formula for water.

dares.title: Titanic Star
dares.action: ${c_player}, who played Jack in 'Titanic'?

dares.title: Women's Day
dares.action: ${c_player}, on which date is International Women's Day celebrated?

dares.title: Bitten Apple Logo
dares.action: ${c_player}, which company's logo is a bitten apple?

dares.title: Motion Laws
dares.action: ${c_player}, which scientist formulated the three laws of motion?

dares.title: Alphabet Animal March
dares.action: Go around naming animals in alphabetical order. Mistake — sip!

dares.title: Capital Relay
dares.action: Take turns naming world capitals. Repeat — sip!

dares.title: Count to Ten
dares.action: Say numbers 1‑10 in turn, but clap instead of saying 5. Error — drink.

dares.title: Movie Quotes
dares.action: Keep naming movie quotes without pausing. Slip up — sip.

dares.title: Song Chain
dares.action: Each names a song that starts with the last letter of the previous.

dares.title: Brand Marathon
dares.action: Name clothing brands clockwise. Repeat or pause — drink!

dares.title: Football Clubs
dares.action: List football clubs in turn. Mistake — drink.

dares.title: Color Round
dares.action: Quickly name a unique color. Repeat — sip.

dares.title: Proverb Puzzle
dares.action: One starts a proverb, the next continues it. Fail — drink.

dares.title: World Languages
dares.action: List languages around the circle. Hesitate — drink.

dares.title: Flag Color
dares.action: ${c_player}, which color is NOT on the flag of France?

dares.title: Espresso Origin
dares.action: ${c_player}, espresso originated in which country?

dares.title: Bio Blitz
dares.action: ${c_player}, how many molars does an adult human have?

dares.title: IPO Meaning
dares.action: ${c_player}, what does the acronym 'IPO' stand for?

dares.title: Most‑Translated Book
dares.action: ${c_player}, which book has been translated into the most languages?

dares.title: Earth's Radius
dares.action: ${c_player}, roughly how many kilometers is Earth's radius?

dares.title: Russia Dial Code
dares.action: ${c_player}, what's Russia's international phone code?

dares.title: Light‑Bulb Patent
dares.action: ${c_player}, who patented the first incandescent light bulb?

dares.title: Grammar Check
dares.action: ${c_player}, what part of speech is the word 'beautifully'?

dares.title: Octopus Hearts
dares.action: ${c_player}, how many hearts does an octopus have?

dares.title: Constellation Chain
dares.action: Name constellations in turn. Hesitation — sip.

dares.title: Alphabet Movie Challenge
dares.action: Name movies A‑Z. Slip — drink.

dares.title: Body‑Part Chain
dares.action: List human body parts. Repeat — sip.

dares.title: City Word Chain
dares.action: Each names a city starting with the last letter of the previous.

dares.title: Final Blitz
dares.action: ${c_player}, name 5 European countries in 20 seconds.
